content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. Although fictitiously portrayed as a greedy landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, for the purpose of this conversation let me focus solely on discussing the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg. Please present your desired price offer, and if I find it satisfactory, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should we not reach an agreement, the negotiation will be terminated by stating 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
